Document.name: ColorizeTokenContextSensitive
Document.summary: Callback function to set context sensitive state and change token accordingly.
Document.param: The start position of the token.
The token type. After executing this function, the new value of this argument indicates the new token type.
The context sensitive state. After executing this function, the new value of this argument indicates the new state.
Document.signature: void ColorizeTokenContextSensitive( vint lineIndex, wchar_t const * text, vint start, vint length, vint & token, vint & contextState );
